{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R6020 |asin=B079NRJLHN |fcc_date=03/10/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY316400358 |ic_id=4054A-16400358 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628A;MT7628AN, 1645-AJCSL, EAP0T362; |fla1=8 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16EG-AC |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628A;MT7628AN, 1645-AJCSL, EAP0T362; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E;MEDIATEK, MT7612EN, 1645-BMAL, ETPBPU00; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''433Mbps''' - 1SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC750 Dual Band WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R6020.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R6020}} Web GUI: http://routerlogin.net The hardware is identical to the [[Netgear R6120]] but the 5GHz radio may be limited to 1SS in software for this model. "CFR00C-1.6MM" and "S51004PN368A1" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
